FAQ / Custom Cards / Team Bayformers / Wave BFA World|Strike / Battle Cards /
NOTE: This card is a part of a custom card set; it is not an official Wizards of the Coast TF:TCG card.

The Dweller Awakens

  1. The Dweller Awakens [Source: BFA World|Strike]
    This is revealed whenever the opponent plays an Action that would reveal or trigger any Secret Action in play. For example, if you have a face-down Infiltrate and a face-down The Dweller Awakens and the opponent plays a Peace Through Tyranny, you would flip both since the Peace Through Tyranny triggers Infiltrate.
